properties.entry: SELECT * FROM SSO_APP_SPECIFIED_SECRET where USER_ID = #userId# and CLIENT_ID is null
SELECT * FROM SSO_APP_SPECIFIED_SECRET where USER_ID = #userId# and CLIENT_ID = #clientId#
delete from SSO_APP_SPECIFIED_SECRET where USER_ID = #userId# and CLIENT_ID = #clientId#

insert into sso_app_specified_secret ( id , name, user_id , client_id , secret , create_time , expires, secret_unique ) values (#id#,#name#,#userId#,#clientId#,#secret#,#createTime#,#expires#, #secretUnique#)

SELECT * FROM SSO_APP_SPECIFIED_SECRET where (SECRET = #appSpecifiedSecretId# or SECRET = #appSpecifiedSecretId2#) and client_id = #clientId# and USER_ID = #userId# UNION ALL SELECT * FROM SSO_APP_SPECIFIED_SECRET where (SECRET = #appSpecifiedSecretId# or SECRET = #appSpecifiedSecretId2#) and (client_id is null or client_id = '') and USER_ID = #userId#

SELECT * FROM SSO_APP_SPECIFIED_SECRET where SECRET = #appSpecifiedSecretId# and client_id = #clientId# and SECRET_UNIQUE = 1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM SSO_APP_SPECIFIED_SECRET where SECRET = #appSpecifiedSecretId# and (client_id is null or client_id = '') and SECRET_UNIQUE = 1

update sso_app_specified_secret set name = #name# , client_id = #clientId# , create_time = #createTime# , last_used_time = #lastUsedTime# , secret = #secret# , expires = #expires# , user_id =#userId# , secret_unique =#secretUnique# where id =#id#
